code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AssistantsList=()=>{const[assistants,setAssistants]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{loadAssistants();},[]);const loadAssistants=()=>{chrome.storage.sync.get(['openai_assistants'],result=>{setAssistants(result.openai_assistants||[]);});};const setActiveAssistant=async assistantId=>{const updatedAssistants=assistants.map(assistant=>({...assistant,active:assistant.id===assistantId}));await chrome.storage.sync.set({'openai_assistants':updatedAssistants});setAssistants(updatedAssistants);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"assistants-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"AI Assistants"}),assistants.length>0?assistants.map(assistant=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`assistant-card ${assistant.active?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>setActiveAssistant(assistant.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"assistant-name",children:assistant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"assistant-model",children:["Model: ",assistant.model]})]},assistant.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No assistants available"})]});};export default AssistantsList;
